n = int(input())
q = list(map(int, input().split()))

p = [0] * n

if sum(q) != 0:
    print(-1)
    exit()

if max(q) > n - 1 or min(q) < -(n - 1):
    print(-1)
    exit()

p[0] = 1

for i in range(n - 1):
    p[i + 1] = p[i] + q[i]

if max(p) > n or min(p) < 1:
    print(-1)
    exit()

print(*p)
